content.webTitle: The great British art quiz: set by the National Trust for Scotland

fields.headline: The great British art quiz: set by the National Trust for Scotland
fields.bodyText: This quiz is brought to you in collaboration with Art UK, the online home for the UK’s public art collections, showing art from more than 3,000 venues and by 45,000 artists. Each day, a different collection on Art UK will set the questions. Today, our questions are from National Trust for Scotland. With industrial buildings, castles, mansions and cottages, the collections range from fine and decorative art to furniture, books and associated archives. NTS collections can be found in more than 50 properties and provide a view into the lives of people across Scotland. The collection cares for around 300,000 objects and has a painting collection of international significance. You can see art from the National Trust for Scotland on Art UK here.
